entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who receives dress robes from Mrs. Weasley. He is described as looking horror-struck and stubbornly refusing to wear the dress robes.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as a person who gives Ron his school list and explains that he needs dress robes for formal occasions. She is described as crossly telling Ron to wear the dress robes.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a person who has a new dress, which Mrs. Weasley mistakenly gives to Ron instead of him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who also receives dress robes from Mrs. Weasley and is shown the dress robes by his mother.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley gives Ron his school list and explains that he needs dress robes for formal occasions.
Mrs. Weasley mistakenly gives Ron Ginny's new dress instead of his own dress robes.
Mrs. Weasley also gives Harry dress robes, which she shows him to Ron.
